content:
I've opened https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/8259 as a result of the discussion in the meeting today for interested folks

Update Wasmtime's policy on `cargo vet` by alexcrichton 路 Pull Request #8259 路 bytecodealliance/wasmtime
This was discussed at today's Wasmtime meeting out of some concerns around our current policies. Namely I felt the current state of affairs is not striking the right balance between cost and benefi...
